I'm using the Acekard 2i with the latest AKAIO firmware (Version 1.7.1) and I have had no problems at all running it, exp works and everything.

Older cards probably wouldn't work with this game, unless the firmware is still being actively updated by someone. If you really want to play this on a console and still have a R4 you might want to consider upgrading. Like I said the Acekard 2i works fine as long as it's updated but I'm sure there are others that work, you just need to do some research (GBATemp is a good place for it).

Something that I found that helps speed up the game in DeSmuME is to change the frame rate

Config > Frame Skip > 1

It I'm pretty sure it makes it skip every other frame, but it really sped up my game, hope it works for you
